name: Job Tracker
description: Get your job search started off on the right foot by using this dedicated Notion template! Inside you'll find:Different board views to prioritize and organize your searchA timeline to track your application progressTags & entries to help you keep all your contacts, links, and notes in one place
features: Different board views to prioritize and organize your search; A timeline to track your application progress; Tags & entries to help you keep all your contacts, links, and notes in one place
